meanings.definition: A type of quilting technique involving padded, raised designs.
meanings.sent1: She learned how to create trapuntos on her quilt, adding dimension to the design.
meanings.sent2: The trapuntos on the pillow made it look more luxurious and elegant.
meanings.sent3: The trapuntos on the blanket were so fluffy, they looked like little clouds sewn into the fabric.
meanings.sent4: Her quilt was a masterpiece, with trapuntos that seemed to come alive with every stitch.
meanings.sent5: The trapuntos on the tablecloth were so intricate, they felt like a secret garden under her fingertips.

meanings.sent1: She admired the trapuntos displayed in the museum, each telling a unique story.
meanings.sent2: The trapuntos in the exhibition showcased different styles and patterns.
meanings.sent3: The trapuntos in her collection were a colorful array of memories stitched together.
meanings.sent4: The trapuntos on the wall seemed to whisper tales of the past to those who gazed upon them.
meanings.sent5: Each of the trapuntos had a charm of its own, adding character to the room.
